::Ender::
       He mutters under his breath and starts bouncing around the room to 
avoid the shots.  He opens a com to Shivah.  "SHIVAH!  What in blazes do you 
think you're doing?!?  Things are under control here!  Turn off the BLASTED 
defenses before I blast THEM!  Ender out!"

--part1_136.1551e25.28cac789_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
